copy.enterCodeDCOM:
If you've already decoded the Secret Fairy Message,

enter your code here:
copy.DCOMLink: <u>See the Secret Fairy Message on Disney.com!</u>
copy.defaulSpecialMsg: Fly into Pixie Hollow and enjoy!
copy.codesInfoText: Secret Codes are offered to players that purchase select Disney products and can be used to unlock special gifts in the online world of Pixie Hollow.* You must already have a Fairy created in order to redeem these codes.
copy.faqText: Learn more about how to find Secret Codes on our FAQs page.
copy.noaccount: Don't have an account yet? Click here to create an account and make a Fairy.
copy.remark: *Toys with Secret Codes are currently only sold in retail stores in the USA.
copy.specialMsgPrefixPlural: did not receive this item because their inventory is full.
copy.specialMsgPrefixSingular: did not receive this item because their inventory is full.
copy.specialMsg: You need to donate some items in the Leaf Journal before receiving this item. Please return to re-enter your secret code once you have made your donation.
copy.inventoryFull: Your inventory is currently full. You need to donate some items before you can redeem your Secret Code. Please return to redeem your Secret Code once you have made a donation.
copy.sorryPageBody: All of your fairies have already received this item! Please try again with a different code.
copy.generalRedeemError: The code you have entered is not a valid secret code. Please try re-entering it.
copy.noFairyRedeemError: Please make sure you have a Fairy created and try re-entering it. If it still does not work please contact us through our Report a Problem page.
copy.alreadyRedeemed: This secret code can only be redeemed once. It has already been redeemed for the account currently logged in.
copy.alreadyUsed: This secret code can only be redeemed once. The code you have entered has already been redeemed. Please verify that you entered the code correctly.
copy.tooManyOfItem: You have too many of that item.
copy.needAFairy: You need a Fairy in order to redeem your secret code. Please return here once you're done creating your Fairy!
copy.invalidlogin: THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH YOUR LOGIN, PLEASE TRY AGAIN
copy.whoamiError: There was an error retrieving your user information
